name: Murder (itch) (FinGames)
description:
Murder is a game made by FinGames for LudumDare 47.

In this game you play as a detective. You are invited to a party by Sullivan, an owner of a mansion with 8 other people. You need to solve the mystery behind Sullivan’s murder by inspecting suspicious thing and talking to the other guests… Can you solve it?

This game was made by FinGames and we would love to get some feedback.

The game is designed for resolution 1920x1080.
